original_text: Esther had not made known her kindred or her people, as Mordecai had commanded her, for Esther obeyed Mordecai just as when she was brought up by him.
korean_text: 에스더는 모르드개가 명령한 대로 그 종족과 민족을 말하지 아니하니 그가 모르드개의 명령을 양육 받을 때와 같이 따름이더라

sentences.original_text: Esther had not made known her kindred or her people
sentences.korean_translation: 에스더는 자신의 친척이나 민족을 알리지 않았다

sentences.original_text: just as when she was brought up by him
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그녀를 양육할 때와 꼭 같았다
